#Generated by VisualGDB project wizard.
#Note: VisualGDB will automatically update this file when you add new sources to the project.

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.7)
project(pislm)
set(LIBRARIES_FROM_REFERENCES "")

set(CMAKE_INCLUDE_CURRENT_DIR ON)
set(CMAKE_AUTOMOC ON)
set(CMAKE_AUTOUIC ON)
set(CMAKE_AUTORCC ON)
find_package(Qt5 COMPONENTS Core Widgets REQUIRED)

add_executable(pislm CAudio.cpp CAudioBuffer.cpp pislm.cpp MainWindow.cpp)
target_link_libraries(pislm -lasound Qt5::Widgets "${LIBRARIES_FROM_REFERENCES}")
include_directories(${CMAKE_SYSROOT}/usr/local/Qt-5.15.2 ${CMAKE_SYSROOT}/usr/local/Qt-5.15.2/QtWidgets Debug/pislm_autogen/include ${CMAKE_SYSROOT}/usr/include/arm-linux-gnueabihf/qt5 ${CMAKE_SYSROOT}/usr/include/arm-linux-gnueabihf/qt5/QtCore ${CMAKE_SYSROOT}/usr/include/arm-linux-gnueabihf/qt5/QtWidgets)
set(CMAKE_LIBRARY_PATH ${CMAKE_LIBRARY_PATH} /usr/local/Qt-5.15.12/lib)
